sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; class ViewRegisteredStudentProfile extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { profile: this.props.location.state.profile, page: this.props.location.state.page, redirector: null, registeredstudents: null }; this.goBack = this.goBack.bind(this); } async goBack() { await this.setState({ registeredstudents: this.props.location.state.registeredstudents }); if (this.state.page === "event") { this.setState({ redirector: ( ) }); } else if (this.state.page === "job") { this.setState({ redirector: ( ) }); } } render() { return (
{this.state.redirector}

{this.state.profile.studentfullname}

BasicDetails

Objective :
{this.state.profile.message || ""}
Date of Birth :
{this.state.profile.dob || ""}
City :
{this.state.profile.city || ""}
State :
{this.state.profile.state || ""}
Country :
{this.state.profile.country || ""}
Skillset :
{this.state.profile.skillset || ""}

Contact Details

EMail :
{this.state.profile.email || ""}
Phone :
{this.state.profile.phone || ""}

Education Details

College Name :
{this.state.profile.schoolname || ""}
College Location:
{this.state.profile.clglocation || ""}
Degree:
{this.state.profile.degree || ""}
Major:
{this.state.profile.major || ""}
YearOfPassing:
{this.state.profile.yearofpassing || ""}
CGPA:
{this.state.profile.cgpa || ""}

Experience Details

Company Name:
{this.state.profile.company || ""}
Job Title:
{this.state.profile.title || ""}
Company Location:
{this.state.profile.complocation || ""}
Start Date:
{this.state.profile.startdate || ""}
End Date:
{this.state.profile.enddate || ""}
Work Description:
{this.state.profile.workdescription || ""}
); } } export default ViewRegisteredStudentProfile;
